long_description: Girls will be ready to sail away to the islands once they put on the breezy, vacation-inspired Wallaroo Petite Catalina Hat. Hand-woven from genuine raffia, the wide brim will help keep her cool. Crown circumference is sized to fit most 7- to 14-year olds' heads. The Wallaroo Petite Catalina Hat is made of 100% raffia; do not wash.
short_description: Girls will be ready to sail away to the islands once they put on the breezy, vacation-inspired Wallaroo Petite Catalina Hat.
